element.name: State Associated with the Certification/Licensure Levels
element.definition: The state associated with the state certification/licensure levels.
element.v3Comment:
Associated with the state (dAgency.04 - EMS Agency State). Since multiple states can exist, this information is multiple entry with the other items in the section associated with each of the states.
GNIS Codes Website: http://geonames.usgs.gov/domestic/download_data.htm
